description:
The Cool-Lite™ Long Sleeve Hoodie is a lightweight, ultra-breathable performance hoodie that manages moisture on aerobic days and add a layer of protection when exposed to the elements. Made with a soft, stretchy and odour-resistant Cool-Lite™ jersey fabric, this hoodie also features a small side-seam stash pocket for small essentials, thumb-loop cuffs to keep your sleeves in place, and a fitted hood for added coverage.

Soft merino wool and TENCEL®, sourced from responsible eucalyptus plantations, combine to create Icebreaker Cool-Lite™, a lightweight, breathable and quick drying fabric.Inspired by nature, Icebreaker harnesses the performance qualities of natural fibres to offer an alternative to clothing based on petrochemical synthetics.
name: Icebreaker Merino 125 Cool-Lite Sphere LS Hoodie - Mens
